about.description: Horeqa se especializa exclusivamente en tecnología de hostelería. Somos independientes, agnósticos de la plataforma y estamos enfocados en el éxito operativo a largo plazo.
areas.activations.body: Activamos productos nosotros mismos a través de nuestra red de partners.
areas.activations.title: Horeqa Activations
areas.billing.body: We bill your services centrally in a single invoice.
areas.billing.title: Horeqa Billing
areas.consulting.body: We analyze your current setup and what you need across technology solutions.
areas.consulting.title: Horeqa Consulting
areas.sales.body: We build a tailored commercial proposal for your business model and operating context.
areas.sales.title: Horeqa Sales
areas.services.body: Hands-on services to support your day-to-day operations, so you can focus on your business.
areas.services.title: Horeqa Services
areas.subtitle: From discovery to billing, Horeqa runs the key execution areas needed to keep your technology stack under control.
areas.support.body: We provide support across all activated services in one operational flow.
areas.support.title: Horeqa Support
areas.title: How Horeqa operates for restaurants
breadcrumb.label: Breadcrumb
clients.note: Horeqa works as a neutral partner between operators and technology providers.
clients.title: Enfocado en hostelería, exclusivamente.
contact.description: Whether you are planning a new technology rollout, need help with existing integrations, or want an independent assessment of your tech stack, we are here to help.
contact.form.error: We could not send your message right now. Please try again or email us at {{email}}.
contact.form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project or needs
contact.form.name: Name
contact.form.restaurantNamePlaceholder: Name of your restaurant or chain
contact.form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.form.title: Send us a message
contact.guaranteeText: We typically respond within 24 hours. For urgent inquiries, please call us directly.
contact.thankYou: Thank you. We will be in touch shortly.
contact.thankYouText: We've received your message and will respond within 24 hours.
contact.title: Let's talk about your technology needs.
coverage.close: We work with a limited ecosystem of validated providers. If a tool is not defensible, we do not operate it.
coverage.subtitle: We are not software. We are the team that makes everything work: configuration, integrations, incidents, and continuous improvements.
coverage.title: We cover most of your technology operations.
footer.description: Socio tecnológico de extremo a extremo para las operaciones de restaurantes. Implementación, coordinación de proveedores y soporte continuo.
footer.partners.note: Structured growth model with onboarding, operational support, and continuous enablement.
footer.providers.note: Implementation et support dans de vrais restaurants. Sélectif, opérationnel et responsable.
hero.note: If something breaks, you call us. We coordinate vendors and get it resolved.
hero.subtitle: We select, implement, and operate your technology: ordering, POS, payments, delivery, reservations, menus, and back office. One contact. One accountable owner.
hero.title: Tu socio tecnológico para el día a día del restaurante.
hero.trustedBy: Confiado por los principales operadores de hostelería
home.operators.p1: Trabajamos con restaurantes, grupos y operadores de hostelería que necesitan implementar, mejorar o reorganizar su tecnología sin complejidad o riesgo innecesarios. Horeqa actúa como un único punto de contacto y se hace responsable de todo el proceso tecnológico.
home.operators.p2: Nuestro trabajo comienza por entender su negocio y la realidad de su operación. Analizamos sus necesidades, flujos de trabajo y objetivos, y revisamos las herramientas que ya utiliza para identificar fricciones, ineficiencias y limitaciones.
home.operators.p3: Based on that analysis, we design a technology proposal aligned with your operation: adding new solutions, optimizing existing tools, or replacing platforms when needed. Always with a practical approach focused on day-to-day execution.
home.operators.p4: We manage the full rollout. We configure solutions, coordinate vendors, train teams, and leave the system running in production. Horeqa does not just recommend: we execute and stay involved.
home.operators.p5: Once the system is live, we remain by your side. We provide ongoing operational support and become your day-to-day technology contact. Depending on the project and tools involved, we can also centralize service management and billing to simplify operations further.
home.operators.p6: Con Horeqa, no necesitas coordinar múltiples proveedores o plataformas. Tienes un partner que entiende tu negocio, asume la responsabilidad y se asegura de que la tecnología funcione.
home.operators.title: Un único partner, de principio a fin.
locale.modal.subtitle: Select language and country. You will stay on the same page when available.
locale.modal.title: Choose your locale
meta.global.description: Horeqa ayuda a los restaurantes y operadores de hostelería a implementar, integrar y operar su pila tecnológica.

partners.hero.subtitle: Join the Horeqa network: combine your commercial strength with our operations, support, and technical coordination to sell technology solutions to restaurants in a more profitable, efficient, and scalable way.
partners.hero.title: Multiplica tus ingresos con una red de partners estructurada y soporte operativo de primera línea.

partners.problem.body: La mayoría de los partners pierden tiempo y margen en trabajos operativos duplicados: activaciones fragmentadas, soporte reactivo y coordinación inconsistente entre herramientas y proveedores. Horeqa elimina esa fricción para que su equipo pueda centrarse en vender y hacer crecer cuentas.
partners.problem.title: El desafío del partner hoy
partners.proof.body: Desde instalaciones y operaciones de tienda hasta eventos y habilitación de partners, Horeqa ejecuta directamente en el campo. Los partners obtienen un motor de entrega en el que pueden confiar al vender y escalar cuentas.

process.closing: Un partner. Una conversación. Un equipo responsable.
process.ctaText: Ready to streamline your technology stack?
process.steps.design.description: We define the right tech stack for your operation, keep what works, replace what doesn’t, and coordinate all the tools involved: ordering, POS, payments, delivery, menus and back office.
process.steps.design.title: We take ownership of your technology
process.steps.discover.description: We start by understanding how your restaurant really works: service model, team, peak hours, current tools and daily pain points. No generic setups, no assumptions.
process.steps.discover.title: We understand your operation
process.steps.implement.description: We configure everything, connect the systems, train your team and manage the go-live. You don’t deal with multiple vendors or setups. We do.
process.steps.implement.title: We implement and go live with you
process.steps.support.description: Once live, Horeqa becomes your single point of contact. Incidents, changes, improvements or scaling. We handle it and coordinate with providers when needed.
process.steps.support.title: We operate and support the day-to-day
process.title: A simple model, built for real restaurant operations.
providers.apply.include.integrations: Documentación de integración o una visión general de su API y partners
providers.apply.include.markets: Markets and operator profiles you serve
providers.apply.subtitle: Send a short overview and we will reply with next steps. If the platform is not a fit, we will say so clearly.
providers.apply.title: Apply as a provider
providers.close.statement: Horeqa no es un revendedor genérico ni un canal comercial commoditizado. Somos un socio exigente y especializado, diseñado para la colaboración a largo plazo y las operaciones de hospitalidad reales.
providers.collaboration.p1: Collaboration models depend on the solution and the provider.
providers.collaboration.p2: In einigen Fällen übernimmt Horeqa die Implementierung und den First-Line-Support. In anderen koordinieren wir die Abläufe mit den Teams des Anbieters.
providers.collaboration.p3: Unified or delegated billing is evaluated case by case, based on technical capabilities and project fit.
providers.collaboration.title: How we collaborate
providers.evaluation.body1: Horeqa does not include every solution in its ecosystem. Each platform is evaluated internally before any collaboration.
providers.evaluation.body2: Only platforms we can stand behind in front of our clients are included.
providers.evaluation.title: Every platform goes through an internal evaluation
providers.fit.dontWorkWith.notRealOps: Solutions not designed for real hospitality operations

providers.fit.workWith.categories: POS, ordering, payments, and operational software

providers.fit.workWith.title: Who we work with
providers.hero.side.body: This is not a reseller page. Horeqa is an operational standard. We protect execution quality for restaurants and for providers.
providers.hero.subheadline: Horeqa es un socio de implementación y operaciones para proveedores de tecnología de hospitalidad seleccionados. Solo trabajamos con plataformas que cumplen con nuestros estándares técnicos y operativos.
providers.ownership.support: Providers can work with Horeqa on one specific area or across the full operational lifecycle.
providers.ownership.title: Where Horeqa takes ownership
